summary: After a tragic accident Grace is lost and alone in the Smoky Mountains. Grace's struggle for survival is made more complicated by her troubled past. Battling the demons in her mind may be the only way to come out alive.
cast: Charisma Carpenter|Juliet Reeves London|Jeremy London|Lee Perkins|John Still|Shaun Benson|Rezia Massey|Lauren Bayleigh White|Ross Williams
title: Girl in Woods
